name: JustOne - Software
body:
Main project is the Arduino featured car bot that will be controlled over internet from a simple browser.

# NetBot
> Android project to control a robot over internet

***
It will allow a user to command a robot using an Android device. Communication between device and robot is via Bluetooth and the device uses internet to receive commands from user. Also the device is making use of the camera to send images so that the user can see what the robot sees.

## Project page
> [http://justonesoft.github.io/NetBot/](http://justonesoft.github.io/NetBot/)
